creator: Darke Media Group
title: DMG Interactive mixed-media stories
description: Darke Media Group (DMG) is a company that creates and publishes cutting-edge, interactive, mixed-media stories. They aim to connect artists and change the art of storytelling. They require funding for project development and promotion.
steps: Darke Media Group, LLC was created by Michael, Reema, and Danny.
The company focuses on developing and promoting interactive, mixed-media stories.
The company will use funds to recruit artists and start a grassroots movement to promote the type of storytelling that they do.
The company will use funds for branding, website development and copyrighting.
